DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate impact two FDA approve culture medium potential human embryo result IVF ( sequential & monophasic medium ) . Half patient 's embryo randomly assign grow monophasic medium & half sequential medium . All embryos undergo Comprehensive Chromosome Screening ( CCS ) & best euploid embryo group transfer result double embryo transfer ( DET ) . If euploid embryos one group , patient single embryo transfer ( SET ) ( fresh frozen ) .
DOC.brief_title: Sequential vs. Monophasic Media Impact Trial ( SuMMIT )
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo IVF/CCS ( PGD banking ) Patient meet ASRM guideline Double Embryo Transfer ( DET ) Donor Sperm OK AMH ≥ 1.2 FSH ≤ 12 BAFC ≥12 Max 1 prior fail IVF cycle patient 3545 year old Patient < 35 year old MUST 1 prior fail IVF cycle Chronic endometrial insufficiency Use oocyte donor gestational carrier Medical contraindication Double Embryo Transfer ( DET ) Male Factor ( < 100,000 sperm surgical sperm ) Communicating hydrosalpinx ( HSG ) Single gene disorder sex selection
